participant_1.background:
I am slightly overweight because I spend too much time watching television and not enough time exercising.
My most valuable possession is my Tigers baseball jersey.
I am not vain, but I do take care of my appearance because I want to look my best when I travel with my twin sister.
I listen to music that helps me calm down and release my stress.
I take a deep breath and remind myself that I'm strong and capable.

participant_2.background:
I have a box of letters from my parents that I keep safe.
I find that spending time in the gym helps me to take care of both my mind and my body.
My feet hurt after long runs in my boots.
i talk very fast.
I remember singing along to Queens of the Stone Age with my sisters in the car on long road trips.

content.text: Hi there! I'm in the mood for some conversation, are you up for it?
Sure, what do you want to talk about?
What are some of your favorite things to do?
I love to spend time in the gym, it helps me to take care of both my mind and body.
That's great! I used to be more active, but I've been slacking lately.
What are some of your favorite ways to relax?
I usually listen to music or take a deep breath and remind myself that I'm strong and capable.
I love to sing along to Queens of the Stone Age with my sisters in the car on long road trips.
What's your favorite song by them?
My favorite song is probably "No One Knows". What's yours?
I love "Go With The Flow". It's so catchy!
It is a great song! I also love "Feel Good Hit of the Summer".
That's a good one too! I love their music.
Me too! It's so good to have a conversation about music.
Me too! Thanks for talking to me.
